comments: A seminar in which recent topics have been The Analysis of Presidential Elections, Conservative Political Economy, and Political Geography.  The course material changes due to the fact that this class is a seminar. The material covered this semester included "human rights" and "international law." Students generally enjoyed the class and found the course material "interesting.'   The people who took this class were all pleased with having Dr. Fetni as a professor. One students said, "Dr. Fetni is clearly very knowledgeable and has a lot of very interesting insights events." Another students said, "He wants all students to succeed and will help anyone to achieve their goals." Students also commended Dr. Fetni for doing "an extremely good job of making the course relevant to what is going on currently in the world." Students found Dr. Fetni easily to contact and communicate with.   The bulk of the work is discussion in class and the readings. Students should be prepared to doing do "lengthy" reading.

section.name: America in Context / Contemporary Issues in American Politics
